other_tests.findings: Homozygous G to A transition at position /H110015 of the donor splice site of intron 2 discovered in the proposita, causing TSH deficiency due to exon skipping.
Demonstrated that the mutation in the donor splice site causes exon 2 to be skipped, resulting in TSH deficiency.
Decreased serum free T4 level of 1.4 pmol/liter and free T3 of 1.27 pmol/liter; low TSH concentration of 0.19 mU/liter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Following treatment with 50 Âµg l-T4, serum free T4 and free T3 concentrations increased to 11.5 and 6.6 pmol/liter, respectively; serum TSH level remained low at 0.07 mU/liter.

other_tests.findings: Thyroid gland was of normal size.
